metadata.title: CVE-2023-46929 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue discovered in GPAC 2.3-DEV-rev605-gfc9e29089-master in MP4Box ingf_avc_change_vui /afltest/gpac/src/media_tools/av_parsers.c:6872:55 allowsattackers to crash the application.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
